entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @HHSGov @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Mike - What you are portraying about Covid19 situation VS the reality of what is really transpiring is stunning. While we know you are only a messenger for Trump, non the less as VP you have an obligation under your office to tell us the truth...
